rows.label: tlk70000080_04_msg0001
rows.name:
We were powerless against the Holy Grail.
Because of that, the Iiran seal fell
into his hands...

rows.label: tlk70000080_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Onyx has been out scouting potential
soldiers.

rows.label: tlk70000080_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But it's not like other normal people
are going to be a match for the Holy Grail
when we weren't...

rows.label: tlk70000080_04_msg0004
rows.name:
We've got to increase the number of
our Blades and join forces to oppose
him.
